thread.title: Suspect in latest Florida school shooting: 'I shot through the door'

title: Suspect in latest Florida school shooting: 'I shot through the door'
text:
Suspect in latest Florida school shooting: 'I shot through the door' Saturday, April 21, 2018 - 01:18 
Sky Bouche, the suspect who police say opened fire on another student at Forest High School, says he's 'sorry' as he is walked out by authorities on his way to jail. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
